Title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - M365 Copilot Chat adoption metrics
Description:
Insights on M365 Copilot Chat adoption for users not licensed for M365 Copilot. Insights will include usage trends over time, adoption by group, retention, and app level breakdowns. Users can filter by organizational attributes to uncover adoption patterns. Admins can disable M365 Copilot Chat insights in Microsoft Admin Center.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: October CY2025
